source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_00<tab>Learned men write that he who is wroth feels not the <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((approach of night)) ((morning sun)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((sun overhead)) ((approach of night)) /var>)) /var>, and Alyrloef certainly seems insensible to all but his pressing need for your service.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_00<tab>Alyrloef ne pense plus qu'à une chose et il a besoin de votre aide.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_01<tab>Sergeant Roehanth's presence is missed at Tidegate, and Alyrloef bids you hurry to the Founder's Crypt to find him. Speak to Roehanth, but remember that one disturbs a man at his devotions at one's own peril.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_01<tab>On a besoin du sergent Roehanth au barrage, et Alyrloef vous demande d'aller le trouver à la tombe d'Aerghaemr. Parlez à Roehanth, mais n'oubliez pas que si vous le dérangez, c'est à vos risques et périls.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_02<tab>Fortunately, you catch Roehanth at the end of his orisons, and the sight of the flowers in your hands disposes him favorably towards you. Place the spring stars on the grave.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_02<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, vous tombez sur Roehanth alors qu'il termine ses oraisons, et les fleurs que vous tenez le mettent de bonne humeur. Placez <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E884C0202 /var> sur la tombe.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_03<tab>The clean scent of spring stars lifts the gloom of this lonely place, and Roehanth's aspect loses much of that brooding look. There is a tale that brings the rough Roegadyn soldier to his knees thus, one you may learn yet by speaking to him.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_03<tab>Le doux parfum de <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E884C0202 /var> égaye ce triste endroit, et Roehanth n'a plus l'air mé<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>co<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>que qu'il arbore généralement. Une histoire perturbe cependant le soldat roegadyn. Vous en saurez sûrement plus en lui parlant.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_04<tab>Before Roehanth, a headstone. Under the stone, a settler named Aerghaemr who breathed his last not on his farm, but holding a trail against the Sahagin as his comrades made their escape. Such is the man that this sergeant and former corsair has chosen as his lodestar.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_SEQ_04<tab>Devant Roehanth se dresse une pierre tombale, dernière demeure d'un colon nommé Aerghaemr qui a trouvé la mort alors qu'il repoussait des Sahuagins et permettait à ses camarades de s'enfuir. C'est donc cet homme que le sergent, ancien corsaire, a choisi comme guide.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_TODO_01<tab>Place the flowers on the Founder's Crypt.

TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_000<tab>Where is Roehanth? I told that barnacle the engineers were letting us take the new cannon out for a test. The Twelve know when the mood will next strike those hugger-muggers.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_000<tab>Où est Roehanth<var 1D /var>? Je lui ai pourtant dit que les ingénieurs nous avaient permis de tester le canon. Seuls les Douze savent quand nous aurons une autre opportunité de ce genre.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_001<tab>Probably over at the crypt again. Morbid, I call it. I like a good wallow now 'n' then, but he broods on dead folk he didn't even know. You go fetch Roehanth, I'd be liable to profane the lichyard by beating him about his thick head with that big stone hourglass.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_001<tab>Sûrement à la crypte, pour changer. Je trouve cela morbide. S'apitoyer sur soi-même est tout à fait normal, mais il ne connaissait même pas ces gens. Allez trouver Roehanth, je vous en prie.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_002<tab>Ah, there I go again, blaspheming the Keeper. Not that I much cared for that poncey─and that's probably 'nother bit of abominating. Here, take these flowers. Roehanth's at the Founder's Crypt. Give him the pretties for the dead, that'll clear my slate with the gods.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ALYRLOE_000_002<tab>Tenez, prenez cette fleur. Roehanth se trouve près de la tombe d'Aerghaemr. Donnez-lui pour honorer la mémoire du défunt.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_010<tab>Rest in the peace of the Twelve, Aerghaemr...
TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_011<tab>Ah, you bring flowers! Come, no need to be shy, there's plenty of space. Small in life, he who sleeps here is large in death.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_011<tab>Ah, vous apportez des fleurs<var 1D /var>! Approchez, ne soyez pas timide.
TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_DUMMY_000_020<tab>エールグヘームルの墓に花を手向ける。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_030<tab>You'd never know now there was a hamlet here, would ye? Halfstone, 'twas called, built on the sweat of near ten score brows─and put to the Sahagin's torch. The settlers fought, aye, and how, with not a trained soldier among them.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_030<tab>Vous saviez qu'il y avait un hameau ici autrefois<var 1D /var>? Il se nommait Demipierre. Ce sont d'honnêtes gens qui l'ont construit à la sueur de leur front, mais les Sahuagins y ont mis le feu. Les colons se sont battus mais, sans soldat parmi eux, ils n'avaient aucune chance.

source: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_031<tab>Aerghaemr was one of those, a farmer by trade. He stayed behind to cover the final retreat, asking for as many arrows as could be spared. Then he took off his boots and gave 'em to another, saying it wasn't far where he was going. And here he lies now.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_031<tab>Aerghaemr était l'un de ces colons. C'était un fermier. Il est resté en arrière pour couvrir le départ des autres. Il a pris autant de flèches qu'on a bien voulu lui donner, a enlevé ses bottes pour les offrir à quelqu'un d'autre, sachant qu'il n'irait pas bien loin, et il repose là, désormais.

source:
TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_032Time was, I'd be hard-pressed to imagine doing what he did. Ye don't hold fast to much in a privateer's life. No pirate cap'n's going down with her ship and any cap'n who looks to loyalty more than gold is liable to have his throat slit.
But now, I got to be better than that, don't I? I got to be more like Aerghaemr.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA164_01150_ROEHANTH_000_032<tab>J'ai du mal à imaginer ce qu'il a fait. Peu de capitaines accepteront de sombrer avec leur navire, et ceux qui sont plus intéressés par la loyauté que l'or risquent de finir avec la gorge tranchée... Je dois m'améliorer, n'est-ce pas ? Je dois prendre exemple sur Aerghaemr.
